serverless-cloud-function-application: 本示例Demo演示怎么利用COS来做MapReduce，一共需要2个函数：map_function和reduce_function，3个COS Bucket：srcmr、middlestagebucket 和 destmr
具体使用方法步骤说明，可参考产品文档的最佳实践：https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/583/9728
腾讯云无服务器云函数团队
This is one of the MapReduce function which is map_function
The detail of step description, please refer to product doc https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/583/9728
